text: Yaariyan 2 is a 2023 Indian movie. It is a Radhika Rao and Vinay Sapru directed coming-of-age comedy drama. It features Yash Daasguptaa, Divya Khosla Kumar, Warina Hussain, Lillete Dubey, Meezaan Jafri, Pearl Puri, Priya Prakash Varrier, Anaswara Rajan and Bhagyashri Borse. Yaariyan 2 is Hindi remake of the Malayalam movie Bangalore Days. This is the first Hindi movie for Daasguptaa, Puri, Rajan and Borse. ==Cast== *Divya Khosla Kumar as Laadli Chibbar, Abhay's Wife. *Yash Daasguptaa as Abhay Singh Katyal, a business executive, a former motocross racer, Ladli's husband. *Meezaan Jafri as Shikhar Randhawa, a motorcycle mechanic, motocross racer with a carefree attitude. *Pearl V Puri as Bajrang Das Khatri, a software engineer who does not like city life and prefers to be traditional. *Anaswara Rajan as Ikroor Awasthi, a paraplegic radio jockey and Shikar's love interest later his wife. *Priya Prakash Varrier as Devi, Bharatnatyam dancer, who has embraced Indian culture. Bajrang's wife. (Special appearance). *Warina Hussain as Shona, air hostess, who has a brief experience with Bajrang also his ex-love interest. *Bhagyashri Borse, Abhay's late girlfriend. *Lillete Dubey *Murali Sharma *Rahul Bose *Yo Yo Honey Singh special appearance in song ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020s Indian movies
title: Yaariyan 2
